channel.title: Slayer tower height switching / "Object update"?
channel.description:
Heya ppl.
I recently started slayer, and have encountered a problem. When i add a code to the stairs, making it change your height level, it will take away all the NPCs from the height level 0, and will show the NPCs from height level 1, but then the objects and appearance around you on height level 1 are the same as height level 0. If you logout and then log back in, you will see the objects and appearance for height level 1, but then if you try and use the stairs to go down, it doesnt do anything, its just staying the same?
Anyone encountered and fixed this problem? or anyone who knows my problem? Many thanks, WRX`

item.title: Slayer tower height switching / "Object update"?
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

Alright, i fixed it guys.

Thanks for attempting to help me though.

Read full topic

item.title: Slayer tower height switching / "Object update"?
item.dc:creator: @Prima Prima
item.description:
@Prima wrote:

[quote=“WRX`, post:1, topic:248458”]Heya ppl.

I recently started slayer, and have encountered a problem.
When i add a code to the stairs, making it change your height level, it will take away all the NPCs from the height level 0, and will show the NPCs from height level 1, but then the objects and appearance around you on height level 1 are the same as height level 0.
If you logout and then log back in, you will see the objects and appearance for height level 1, but then if you try and use the stairs to go down, it doesnt do anything, its just staying the same?

Anyone encountered and fixed this problem? or anyone who knows my problem?
Many thanks, WRX`[/quote]

Did you update the player, and the players appearance? (updateRequired= true;, appearanceUpdateRequired = true;).

Read full topic
